H0.text: In John Bunyan's Pilgrim's Progress, where did the Giant Despair live. Doubting Castle

H1.text: In John Bunyan's Pilgrim's Progress, where did the Giant Despair live. The Valley of the Shadow of Death

H2.text: In John Bunyan's Pilgrim's Progress, where did the Giant Despair live. The Slough of Despond

H3.text: In John Bunyan's Pilgrim's Progress, where did the Giant Despair live. Timorous

A4.text: Giant Despair, the savage owner of Doubting Castle, where pilgrims are imprisoned and tortured.

A5.text: Giant Despair was killed and Doubting Castle was demolished in the second part of The Pilgrim's Progress.
